articles.description: Crunching the numbers, the returns made by these retail investors in Tata Motors during CY 2023 reach a mind-boggling Rs 2,30,46,12,44,496. Life Insurance Corporation (LIC) holds 129,210,523...
articles.content:
Investors witnessed a spectacle as the stock soared to dizzying heights, delivering a jaw-dropping multibagger return of 101.04 per cent
As the curtain falls on the final trading session of 2023, th… [+2897 chars]

articles.author: Harsh Upadhyay & Shashank Pathak
articles.title: Indian startups raised more than $11 Bn in 2023: Report - Entrackr
articles.description: According to startup data intelligence platform TheKredible, nearly 984 startups raised venture funding worth more than $11 billion in 2023.
